name: Space Station Traffic Controller
description:
Welcome to the station! Your job is to guide the space traffic around our station by sending them text commands. Ask them what type of landingpad they require, then send them there. For succesful dockings you get reputation and money. But avoid ships crashing into one another!

Future goals for the game:

- Events like solar storms or pirate raids

- Using money to expand the station

- Use science to unlock parts to expand the station

- More types of ships

- Smarter ships
